actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-477.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4188) to effect the reductions in net expenditures for milk price support activities as required by the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4188 (milk price support limitations).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4188) to effect the reductions in net expenditures for milk price support activities as required by the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985.
